ygData.subject: Re: LN was right (did I actually say that)
ygData.msgSnippet: The problem does not entirely rely on the players within, it relies on the lack of real story in the RPG that isn t known to the entire RPG. This whole

The problem does not entirely rely on the players within, it relies on the 
lack of real story in the RPG that isn't known to the entire RPG. This whole 
artifacts thing seems to be some small last attempt to get people going 
again, but how long until battles will begin for the artifacts that will 
undoubtably end and begin and follow through like all the other battles? When 
will bots suddenly realize they have ammo and can't possibly have clips for 
weapons that allow them to fire 120 shots by firing 40 shots in the span of 3 
posts? When will people realize that their charachter can not possibly dodge 
and then counter attack to each person that fired at them in a single post 
when the posts are supposed to last a few seconds each. This isn't DBZ, it's 
Beast Wars and if you haven't noticed noone in the show goes SSJ and suddenly 
dodges everything every five seconds and then returns fire to each person. 
When will players also acknowledge simple facts that some charachters cant 
take the exhuberent amount of damage that others do and sometimes the 
charachter they have is just completely outclasssed, outgunned, and if a 
fight continued against the charachter they were fighting, out of service. I 
have proposed many things to the council and soem  have been welcomed more 
than others yet I have seen none of those even leak into the RPG. In order to 
correct some of the things I have described above the concil needs to take 
more control and enforce certain rules to prevent them from happening, of 
course the players can help too simply by waking up and noticing they aren't 
little kids who are controling a Bantor action figure and having him wreck 
everyone of their toys because they think its cool. We are adults and as we 
all know the only toy Bantor could possibly beat down is Optimus Minor. And 
maybe a spy changer or two since he would get nuked ready fast by any BW toy 
with a gun. Anyway, my ranting is over.

~Qs7, LN, Whatever- who now feels like taking a bat to Bantor for the hell of 
it.

--part1_169.f837627.2a471f32_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

<HTML><FONT FACE=arial,helvetica><FONT  SIZE=2>The problem does not entirely rely on the players within, it relies on the lack of real story in the RPG that isn't known to the entire RPG. This whole artifacts thing seems to be some small last attempt to get people going again, but how long until battles will begin for the artifacts that will undoubtably end and begin and follow through like all the other battles? When will bots suddenly realize they have ammo and can't possibly have clips for weapons that allow them to fire 120 shots by firing 40 shots in the span of 3 posts? When will people realize that their charachter can not possibly dodge and then counter attack to each person that fired at them in a single post when the posts are supposed to last a few seconds each. This isn't DBZ, it's Beast Wars and if you haven't noticed noone in the show goes SSJ and suddenly dodges everything every five seconds and then returns fire to each person. When will players also acknowledge simple facts that some charachters cant take the exhuberent amount of damage that others do and sometimes the charachter they have is just completely outclasssed, outgunned, and if a fight continued against the charachter they were fighting, out of service. I have proposed many things to the council and soem  have been welcomed more than others yet I have seen none of those even leak into the RPG. In order to correct some of the things I have described above the concil needs to take more control and enforce certain rules to prevent them from happening, of course the players can help too simply by waking up and noticing they aren't little kids who are controling a Bantor action figure and having him wreck everyone of their toys because they think its cool. We are adults and as we all know the only toy Bantor could possibly beat down is Optimus Minor. And maybe a spy changer or two since he would get nuked ready fast by any BW toy with a gun. Anyway, my ranting is over.
